metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16515 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Matrix Synapse before 0.33.3.1 allows remote attackers to spoof events andpossibly have unspecified other impacts by leveraging improper transactionand event signature validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.99.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.99.2-1').
